column3: Machine reserved for exclusive/intensive use of CPU and possibly other components and in which running a second process significantly alters the results obtained.
Machine reserved for the exclusive use of the FPGA. However, other people can use the CPU/GPU/etc, as long as this does not imply a full CPU occupation.
Machine reserved for the exclusive use of the GPU. However, other people can use the CPU/FPGA/etc, as long as this does not imply a full CPU occupation.
Others can use the machine, but the resources are probably quite busy. Others cannot put the machine in reserved mode.
Others can use the machine, but cannot put the machine in reserved mode.
